abstract: Emmanuel Koné (born 31 December 1986 in Abongoua) is an Ivorian football player currently under contract with Levadiakos in the Superleague Greece championship.
comment: Emmanuel Koné (born 31 December 1986 in Abongoua) is an Ivorian football player currently under contract with Levadiakos in the Superleague Greece championship.
name: Emmanuel Koné
Koné, Emmanuel
